index.cameraPermissionDeniedMessage: Permission to use the camera has been denied. Scratch will not be able to take a photo or use video sensing blocks.

index.microphonePermissionDeniedMessage: Permission to use the microphone has been denied. Scratch will not be able to record sounds or detect loudness.
